titleStmt.title: An entry from the Journals of Hensley Henson

sourceDesc.bibl: Edited from the manuscripts in the custody of Durham Cathedral Library.

body.p: The Burkitts went away after breakfast. I "fooled round" in my study making notes for the final lecture, while the rest of the party went off for a picnic lunch at Moccas. [Mrs Dickinson completed what she is pleased to believe is a portrait of me.] Dr Pattison came in after dinner to say Goodbye.
